name: Jlove Jlove
text: Spacious interior, no indoor dining is available yet, comfortable looking outdoor seating with heaters.  Everything here seems consistent with other Blaze pizza restaurants.  Excellent selection of fresh toppings and sauces and cheeses. ‚Ä¶More

name: Julia
text: First time trying the keto crust, it was thin and crushy which gave the pizza a good flavor. ‚Ä¶More

name: John B
text: Was there to feed us when others were too afraid to due to the overreaction Covid. Pizza rocked too. So good.

name: Sharon Powers
text: The pizza fast food restaurant is open  and roomy. With abundant room in which you may choose to sit, pick what ever area you fancy. The decor is modern and gives off a vibe of being young,  trendy, clean . . . a place for good, quick chic, ‚Ä¶More

name: Joey Nln
text: I picked up 2 pizzas for a delivery customer and the pizza was not hot left on a shelf not a warmer. Blaze doesn't get the complaint  the drivers get the complaints.

name: Reid Duran
text: We had an excellent  at this restaurant. We enjoyed the extraordinary vibes and the food. The staff members were super personal. I‚Äôm happy we finally decided to try this restaurant.

name: Tony Godfrey
text: Awesome pizza make it the way you want it and quick! üëçüèª

name: E H
text: High quality pizza made to order. Cook times are very fast. Drinks, a few desserts, and salads are also available. Can be crowded during peak lunch and dinner times. Parking can be tight during busy times of day. Quite tasty for what you pay. Recommended.

name: David
text: Incredible pizza place, the pies are build your own one size and you can choose any combinations of toppings you like. Everything here is very fresh, the pizza really taste good. I've never been in a blaze Pizzeria before but I'm glad I ‚Ä¶More

name: sharon auria
text: They baked it to long. BBQ sauce didn't stand out well!

name: Christian B.
text: Awesome pizza and service. They make it exactly as you want it, with as little or as much as you like. The sky is the limit on the cheese and toppings. Go wild and pile it up or keep it light and go minimal. The choice is yours and your ‚Ä¶More

name: Mr Trent
text: Well, I walked inside Blaze Pizza at 8:28 pm only to be told that they cannot take any orders because the server is down and they couldn't charge anyone..... What a disappointment. The place closes at 9pm and I left my hotel room missing the last 8 minutes of the Laker game just to get some pizza.......grrrr

name: Nick Martin
text: Rated it a 1 star because I was the only person in line and it still took 20 mins to complete my order. Ridiculous wait times here be forewarned

name: Lisa Fine
text: We had the Best experience at Blaze Pizza tonight! The customer service was incredible! Adrian, Stephanie & Alex made our night with their cheerful & positive attitude. I love this place! Great food, great customer service and absolutely made our night!

name: Bill Chambers
text: We ordered over Door dash for pickup and the pizza was made on time and what we ordered. That is the only reason for the 2nd star. The pizza itself was horrible. I stopped eating it after 2 slices and got a bowl of cereal.

name: Chunk Chips
text: Pizza was ok. Kind of burnt. When it comes to customer service dont work in it if you cant. I made an online order and there was no option of curbside it just said to call when you are outside.. I called and the employee came out like.5 ‚Ä¶More

name: Felipe Navarro
text: Nice topping options! Nice people! Good pizza! What more do ya need? I think I made a Hawaiian/MeatLovers/Combo pizza lol

name: Todd Smith
text: Ok pizza. Didn't find it to be all that special. Crust is rather bland. Pizzas can become pricey very quick depending on toppings. Way too long of a wait. It took the staff too long to assemble the pies. We literally got on our phone and ordered a pizza quicker than it took to go through the line.

name: Anna Salas
text: The best place to get your own pizza.

name: Ricky Ticky
text: Great customer service and fast good pizzas :)

name: Will Haberthur

name: chad perry
text: My girlfriend and I love this place!

name: Earl
text: Occasionally has a long line which can sometimes end up taking upwards of 30 minutes, but the pizzas are completely customizable, they taste amazing, and they're reasonably priced. ‚Ä¶More

name: Trinh Dinh
text: All you can choose toppings for a flat price!!! Quickly baked! Variety of fountain and fruity drinks. Hard to get pizza from anywhere else.

name: Benjamin Dingman
text: Great Pizza! Sometimes my pizza needed to have some extra time in the oven, but that's my only complaint.

name: Megan Salanoa
text: Love going to Blaze Pizza in Marina! The pizza is amazing and they have really good vegan and gluten free options. I was helped by Conlyn and Stephanie and they were both so friendly and efficient. Food was great, staff was amazing, so what‚Äôs not to like? 5 stars üòä

name: Daniel Britt
text: Pizza is very flat, and the white top one is way too salty with the extra sea salt. But otherwise the servers were kind, the location is good, and the drinks were pretty good. And the lemonade is very tart!

name: Roberto Munita
text: Amazing pizzas. You can choose any topping you like, for a very reasonable price. And quickly

name: Michael Black
text: Great service, excellent food!

name: EzzyFade
text: Small pizzas but customizable, fast, and decent quality

name: Dale W
text: Not quick to do a phone order, without getting multiple - ‚Äòuse our app or order on- line‚Äô .  I just wanted to quickly order a pizza.  Very average - thin & not much for toppings.

name: Sara Styan
text: Fun fresh custom pizza. I really enjoyed that you didn't add a huge price per topping. All of the ingredients tasted fresh and the service was excellent. I was amazed at how quickly they prepared and baked the pizzas.

name: Angie Nader
text: The customer service was so good, my husband was in shock.

name: Pedro Sanchez
text: Great tasting pizza. Teresa who prepped our pizza based on our directions was very pleasant. Well definitely be coming back.

name: Katie Cunningham
text: Yummy build-your-own pizza that's not too expensive. I really like the variety of topping choices (ricotta! artichoke!) and the free arugula and other finishing touches. Agua frescas are a cool and unusual drink option for a pizza place. Good concept!

name: Drew Clinkenbeard
text:
Nice custom pizza chain. Four stars because it is a chain.

People are friendly food is consistently good. The 'hot link' is good but not really spicy

name: Artmis Milani
text: Once and fresh pizza from the ingredient of your choice. The crust was a little too soft, but the taste is definitely there. Clean place; Nice and friendly staff, quick and convenient service. They also offer substitute crust options.

name: Briceida Montes
text: Staff was super friendly even when we did come a bit close to closing time! The pizza was delicious and I would very much be coming again!

name: Daniel Montalvo
text: When you come to this place expect a pizza version of Subway but better. They have lots of options and if you're looking for a quick pizza you can get one around 7-10 minutes

name: Aaz
text: Very tasty crusts!

name: Bouba Gomez
text: The quality and customer service is very bad

name: Adam McCarthy
text: I travel for a living and can honestly say that after 300+ miles, Blaze Pizza is a great way to stop for a refreshing meal. You can make your own pizza that is not heavy and will make you sleepy yet is extremely well made. All ingredients fresh and employees friendly. Will be back. ~Ammtracer

text: Great food and amazing staff! Customer service was outstanding! We're definitely coming back

text: Great food. Quick service. Love their blood orange lemonade. Good family restaurant.

name: Brenda S Meza
text: Very clean, and great staff!  If you are busy, let Uber Eats pick it up,  deliver it,  so you can get back to life!

name: corey stacy
text: Always delicious and affordable. They are very  quick be diligent and I appreciate that. Dinning room is sometimes crowded but that speaks alot to their food.

name: Rachael Andrade
text: Really good pizza. Definitely go with the create your own pizza because you can get as many toppings as you'd like which is awesome. Really cool atmosphere and an awesome place to eat. name: James Hermans

text: We timed it just right as the line was short when we arrived.  I made my own pizza and loved it.  They were not skimpy with the ingredients and my pizza was hot with a crispy crust.  Delicious!

text: Pizza is quickly made and tasty. Store is a little stark and cold for eating in and noisy with music blaring. But it is clean and staff is nice.

name: UserPaul G
text: Great pizza, quickly made and awesome staff!

name: Jay Day

text:
Lots of parking. Fast and friendly staff.

name: Gabriel Linker

text: I'd wait line for an almost unreasonable amount of time for this pizza. Unlimited toppings for one price, vegan cheese and beer service. Can I live here?

text: Thin crust, made fresh daily, reasonable ingredients to make custom pizza. Finally they got more help to get line move faster. text: Amazing place for a bite to eat, workers are really nice :)

text:
Fully customizable pizzas which may or may not be a plus.

text: Great service / location / atmosphere. Recommend.

name: Erin Scholten
text: They make your pizza on the spot with fresh crust and toppings and then fast fire it. Like an order from Subway or qdoba, but better, fresher, and such good flavor! You get a larger personal pizza. I wasn't able to eat the whole thing. It was so delicious though.

name: S A
text: It's not literally fast food but better. It's make your own pizza. Healthy options. Good service. Clean restrooms. Free parking. Good concept. Reasonable rates. The pizza bread tastes great too

name: Peter Mendoza
text: This is honestly the BEST pizza on the bay! The simplicity of the menu makes it all the more worth your money. text:
Awesome!  You pick your crust, a

name: Jesse Lopez
text: Went in today for lunch and Let me say that was one of the best pizzas I've had in a while. The whole create your own concept is awesome. name: Jessie Krislyn
text: Great vegan options & pricing.

name: Candace Sanders

text: I loved it! It was my first time eating here. Great price and service.  Food was fast and fresh.

name: Sara
text: Food came quickly. Bomb salads. Nice employees.

name: Pat Alderman
text: Good thin crust pizza--need a bit more help during the lunch time.

name: Joshua Seagrave
text: Excellent pizza at an acceptable price. All pizzas are made to order with a wide variety of fresh ingredients. Service was very friendly. Blaze has gluten free options, which are invaluable for my wife, who is celiac. There is a rewards app, which I recommend for a first time discount and points, which can be traded for a free pizza.

name: Kat Foebreaker

text: Great tasting pizza and friendly staff.

name: Jon Winkelman

name: Jessica Hoague
text: Fantastic experience! My family loved being able to customize their pizzas. I love that the build your own is a set price rather than charging by the number of topppings. We visited this location while vacationing and I'm hoping this comes to our state soon!

name: Cristina Tessari
text: I definitely recommend this place. You can make your own pizza or choose one of the specialties. All the pizzas were $8.75. In addition, everything is made in front of you in less than 3 minutes.

name: David Minten
text: Great build your own pizza place in Salinas.

name: Jenny Aguilar
text: The line was quite long, the employee we had was new and wasn't sure what white sauce was, but it was quick, good. We're a fan of blaze!

name: denica rodriguez
text: Pizza is really good. Prize is fair. I think they could improve customer service. The staff can be pretty cold and robotic, as in they can seem like they are set on automatic when preparing the pizza.

name: Max Gagliano
text: High quality

text: The wait times for a "fast" pizza is horrendous! The pizza is good but cooking a steak would be quicker! Get it together blaze before you lose all your customers!

text: We love the pizza!  My kids beg to go there for the simple pie (cheese pizza) and my wife gets the build your own with  a huge pile of toppings. text: We had great pizza and enjoyed dining in. The staff was friendly and kept the dining area clean. We will definately return.

name: Erin Mcclure
text: Keeping in mind that this is a chain and what you're getting, we love to go to this place. We split a build your own pizza and enjoy eating outside when the weather is decent for the area. Service has always been great.

name: Craig R. Johnson
text: Nice place to get a pizza  the way you want it.

Always good.

text: Always have great food here. They do get busy and that‚Äôs because they have great prices and great pizza. Even when they are not busy they have ignored me.
